txt.en: It seems that Dolgimil is on the Dor-en Ernil coast
A Need for Interrogation
You ask the lazy Corsair where Dolgimil can be found.\n\n'You want an audience with Dolgimil? You're a fool, [placeholder]. I guess it's your life. I think he's on the coast.'
Interrogate the lazy Corsair

'This Dolgimil must be the one behind the Dor-en-Ernil invasion!

'[placeholder], we should gather information as to Dolgimil's whereabouts. Our best bet might be Gaerlond, a fishing village, now in ruins, just south of here.

'Perhaps some of the more indolent Corsairs around there might be convinced to part with a bit of information. I shall meet you there soon my friend.'
It seems that Dolgimil destroyed Barad Rill
Interrogate drunk corsairs ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Interrogate the besotted Corsair
Interrogate the resting Corsair
It seems that Dolgimil has a stronghold
You ask the drunk corsair where Dolgimil can be found.\n\n'Might be the one who toppled that lighthouse. You don't scare me, [placeholder]!'
You ask the drunk corsair where Dolgimil can be found\n\n'You want an ordinance with Dolgimil? You're a fool, [placeholder]. I guess it's your life. I think he's on the coast.'
You ask the drunk corsair where Dolgimil can be found\n\n'I have not seen him. Though I wouldn't go looking for him you know. He's got a, *hiccup* stronghold.'
It seems that Dolgimil is on the Dor-en Ernil coast
Corsair drunks can be found in Gaerlond, the ruins of a small fishing village.\n\nCollect information from Corsairs in Gaerlond.
Now that Dolgimil has been revealed as the leader behind the Dor-en-Ernil invasion, Aras asks you to seek out information as to Dolgimil's whereabouts.

'It would seem that Dolgimil destroyed Barad Rill and has a stronghold somewhere on the Dor-en-Ernil coast. I know these lands well and the Dor-en-Ernil coast is mostly dunes and rock. The only structure was Barad Rill...\n\n'That's it! Barad Rill must not have been fully destroyed. Dolgimil must be using the ruins as a stronghold!'
You ask the resting Corsair where Dolgimil can be found.\n\n'Might be the one who toppled that lighthouse. You don't scare me, [placeholder]!'
Aras can be found just outside of Gaerlond.\n\nYou should speak with Aras.
Interrogated lazy Corsair
Speak with Aras near Gaerlond
